articles.content: BOSTON (CBS) — Las Vegas Raiders coach Jon Gruden will coach Sunday’s game under uncomfortable circumstances, after comments he made in a 2011 email about NFLPA president DeMaurice Smith surfaced on … [+5403 chars]

articles.title: Mark Stoops and UK Wildcats recap win vs LSU Football - A Sea Of Blue
articles.description: Mark Stoops just keeps making history with Kentucky Football.
articles.content:
Mark Stoops and his Kentucky Wildcats are now 6-0 for the first time since 1950 after beating the LSU Tigers 42-21.
After winning the last four games by just one score, Kentucky made sure fans didnt… [+12773 chars]
